items/other/artifacts/vintage_brush/desc: A rare artifact. This cute vintage tool was used to pet farm animals in years past.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_cow_bell/d: A legendary artifact. This vintage bell would have been used to call cows home in bygone years.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_hammer/des: An uncommon artifact. This vintage wooden hammer was used to break rocks before pickaxes were commonplace.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_sickle/des: An uncommon artifact. This vintage sickle was used by past generations to turn grass into fodder.
items/other/artifacts/vintage_watering_c: An uncommon artifact. This vintage watering can was popular among farmers back in the day.
